Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I stop applications and services from running?  I have an HTC Desire and I have been trying to figure out how to always get my apps and things I don't use to force close when I close them with the home button.I have tried pressing the back button until it closed but that does not work as when I go into my app killer it shows that it is still running. Also, when I go in Applications --> Manage --> Running Service, some apps are still open. In addition, the app killer isnt properly working as when I close all apps in the app killer then go into the running services, some of the apps it killed are still shown as open.Can anybody help please?
Title: Make apps force close automatically without going into settings

history.Text: I have a HTC Desire and I have been trying to figure out how to always get my apps and things I don't use to force close when I close them with the home button and I have tried pressing the back button until it closed but that does not work as when I go in app killer it is still on and when I go in Applications --> Manage --> Running Services then some apps are still open. And the app killer isnt properly working as when I close all apps in app killer then go into the running services the some apps it killed showed it was still open! Can anybody help please?
Android: Make apps force close automatically without going into settings
